name: Cavyrn
detailed_description:
Guide The Hero of Troidarm through the vast terrain of the world they've mistakenly been sent to as they try to find the portal keys required to escape. What challenges await?

Featuring:
- Combat (Hack/Slash)
- Crafting
- Building system (Build walls and spear traps to hold off hordes!)
- Resource gathering
- Small story
- Day/Night cycle
- Hand made small and large dungeons
- Randomly generated map
- Steam Achievements
- Cloud Saves

- A team of dedicated devs to bug fixing and building new content!

short_description: Cavyrn is an Adventure RPG Rogue like set in a randomly-generated open world with wide-open deserts and plains. New surprises await around every corner in the form of challenging caves, dungeons and enemies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-Core CPU @2.5GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

  • Sound Card: Any
